ctu_text:
**Step 2:** Login to the ServicePlus Portal using the Username and Password received over your registered Email ID. 
**Step 3:** In the Left Pane, click "Apply for Service" and then click on "View All Available Services". 
**Step 4:** From the list, click on "RUBBER PLANTATION DEVELOPMENT SCHEME". 
**Step 5:** You will be directed to the application form.
image_prompt: Flat-icon infographic, pastel palette – \n**Step 2:** Login to the ServicePlus Portal using the Username and Password received over your registered Email ID. \n
caption: Poster 1/4 – Benefits (numbers verified)

ctu_text:
Areas notified/certified in the documents as paddy fields are not eligible for any kind of assistance under this scheme.
> **Other Terms & Conditions** 1. The prescribed minimum stand of rubber plants (@450/ha) should be maintained and growth should be satisfactory as assessed by the inspecting officer. 1.
image_prompt: Flat-icon infographic, pastel palette – Areas notified/certified in the documents as paddy fields are not eligible for any kind of assistance under this scheme.
caption: Poster 2/4 – Eligibility (numbers verified)

", "answer": "For plantations in 2018, 2019, 2020, and 2021, the bill of planting material is not mandatory. Instead, a self-declaration containing purchase details is to be uploaded. "}, {"question": "When is a nomination required in the application?

Instead, a self-declaration containing purchase details is to be uploaded)"}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Nomination, if applicable (in case of joint ownership/ minor owner)"}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Caste Certificate (in the case of SC Applicants)"}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "PAH Declaration Form (in the case of PAH)"}]}]}], "documentsRequired_md": "
